sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng liúxià nǐ de liánxì fāngshì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez laisser vos coordonnées.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please leave your contact information.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng gěi wǒ yī píng shuǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Donnez-moi une bouteille d'eau, s'il vous plaît.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please give me a bottle of water.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他们家有一个漂亮的花园。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tāmen jiā yǒu yī gè piàoliang de huāyuán.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Leur maison a un beau jardin.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Their house has a beautiful garden.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il y a beaucoup de monde dans la rue.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: There are many people on the street.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'aime me promener au bord de la mer.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I like to walk by the sea.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'exercice a beaucoup d'avantages.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Exercise has many benefits.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Aider les autres est une bonne chose.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Helping others is a good thing.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est plus grand que moi.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is taller than me.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'été est très chaud.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Summer is very hot.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shì yī gè cōngmíng de shàonián.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est un jeune homme intelligent.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is a smart teenager.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je suis rassasié.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I'm full.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng bùyào cǎi cǎopíng shàng de cǎo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ne marchez pas sur l'herbe de la pelouse.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please don't step on the grass.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 中午我喜欢午睡一会儿。
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'aime faire une sieste à midi.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I like to take a nap at noon.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il y a beaucoup d'étoiles dans le ciel.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: There are many stars in the sky.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ zǎoshang chī le liǎng gè jīdàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai mangé deux œufs ce matin.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I ate two eggs this morning.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai enfin obtenu mon permis de conduire.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I finally got my driver's license.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì jiǎ de, bùshì zhēn de.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est faux, ce n'est pas vrai.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is fake, not real.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il vient du sud de la Chine.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is from southern China.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Chūntiān lái le, shùyè biàn lǜ le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le printemps est arrivé, les feuilles deviennent vertes.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Spring has come, the leaves are turning green.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez tirer la porte.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please pull the door open.
